name: hai reyy :)
greetingText: Tau ngga kamu dimana sekarang? hihi
wishText: Your failure is just another step to make you even more stronger than ever💛. I am so glad that you are one of my closest friend that's still in touch with me⭐. I hope this year you'll get so many blessing and love from people around you💖. Selamat Jalan, Selamat Bertahan Reyy🚀
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text4: Aku mau melakukan sesuatu yang lebih
outroText: Okay that's all hehe, come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
